channel.title: Password encryption
channel.description: how would i get rid of the password encryption? or how do i read it? lol

item.title: Password encryption
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

Its easy, but hard if you dont know.

Ok search for:

Password encryption

And should see soething saying something like,

I run a server why the f**k would I need your password.

Then search down a little bit and you should see something like

end of password encryption

Delete all fo that and it should just go.

Hope it helped.

PS. Everyone will need to make a new account or youll have to change all there password :s. GL

EDIT: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,235507.0.html I just made a tut for you and who ever else needs it, this gets requested alot so I made a TUT, hope it helps.

Read full topic
